content.question: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE social challenge that is associated with living in a large Chinese city (housing, transportation, employment, etc.). In your presentation, describe this social challenge and explain its significance. Prompt 1
